page.title: 11LIFE STYLES
page.content: CAVE CASTLE HOTEL. Cave Castle used to be the home of the Barnard family. They owned a lot of land in South Cave and they were very interested in the well being of the villagers. The castle is now owned by Mr. Frehling Mr. Frehling comes from Holland, he has lived here for three and a half years. He employs 14 full time workers and 30 to 35 part time workers. His 4 chefs come from Holland. The Domesday Book says "..a castle at South Cave..". There have been many alterations to the castle and Mr. Frehling hopes to make more changes in the future. He wishes to move the ballroom back upstairs and he is building new kitchens. The castle has 20 bedrooms and can sleep 30 people.
